question: Q122 Which LINQ query syntax in C# retrieves even numbers from a list numbers?
options: from n in numbers where n % 2 == 0 select n;
select n where n % 2 == 0 from numbers;
where n in numbers select n == 0;
answer: A from n in numbers where n % 2 == 0 select n;
correct_answer: from n in numbers where n % 2 == 0 select n;
